title: Upgrading furfural to bio-fuels using supported molybdenum carbides: study of the support effect
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26920-26932
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04256E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Leticia F. Sosa, Priscilla M. de Souza, Raphaela A. Rafael, Eric Marceau, Valérie Briois, Fabio S. Toniolo, Fabio B. Noronha, Franck Dumeignil, Sébastien Paul
Materials exhibiting different textural and surface properties (SiO2, TiO2, ZrO2 and ZSM-5) were investigated as supports for Mo carbides in the upgrading of furfural (FF) in liquid phase to produce 2-methylfuran (2MF).
